turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Callium.
turn.1: What happened in Callium during the British Empire?
turn.2: Following their campaign, the city was rebuilt.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Several of its citizens, as attested epigraphically, rose to the political hierarchy of the Aetolian League.
turn.5: What happened after they rebuilt the city?
turn.6: Excavations revealed a wealthy city, with civic organization and sanctuaries.
turn.7: Did the city eventually get ruined?
turn.8: However, the inhabitants seem to have taken parts in the political frictions of the 2nd century BCE regarding the advent of ancient Rome.
turn.9: What happened after the city got ruined?
turn.10: After the Battle of Pydna (167 BCE) it seems that Callium was destroyed by a fire possibly due to an arson.
turn.11: Did the city ever get rebuilt?
turn.12: In the 9th century CE, Lidoriki appears to have succeeded Callium as it features in the episcopal lists of that time.
